  • Method Details

    • importKeyRing

      public static int importKeyRing​(java.io.File file, boolean isPublic)
      Import a single key ring
      Parameters:
      file - File that contains key ring
      isPublic - True for public key rings, false for private key rings
      Returns:
      0 on successful import, 1 on failed

    • exportKeyRing

      public static int exportKeyRing​(java.lang.String path, long keyId, boolean isPublic)
      Export a signle key ring
      Parameters:
      path - Path to where to export key
      keyId - Id of the key to export
      isPublic - True for public key rings, false for private key rings
      Returns:
      0 on successful export, 1 on failed

    • deleteKeyRing

      public static int deleteKeyRing​(long keyId, boolean isPublic, java.lang.String passphrase)
      Drops a private or public key ring from corresponding collection
      Parameters:
      keyId - Id of the key to delete
      isPublic - True for public key rings, false for private key rings
      passphrase - Only needed for dropping private key
      Returns:
      0 on successful delete, 1 on failed

    • generateNewKeyRingPair

      public static int generateNewKeyRingPair​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String userEmail, java.lang.String passphrase, int rsaEncryptKeySize, int rsaSignKeySize)
      Generate a new public/private key ring pair
      Parameters:
      userName - user name
      userEmail - user email
      passphrase - password to protect private key
      rsaEncryptKeySize - size of RSA keypair for encryption in bits (1024,2048,4096)
      rsaSignKeySize - size of RSA keypair for signing in bits (1024,2048,4096)
      Returns:
      0 on success, 1 on failed

      Returns:
      User identity string
